title: Hippies Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Delivery, Take-out only, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Delivery or carry-out only, no dine-in. Could order pizza in four different styles (Detroit, Chicago, LA, New York) and can be made vegan with vegan cheese and toppings like vegan sausage and tofu. Also makes vegan cheesy breadsticks, cinnamon breadsticks, BBQ tofu subs, and vegan calzones. This restaurant is Michigan family owned, and the soda served is "Home Grown Faygo". Previously named Pizzallica.
